name: Chained by Glory
description:
"Chained by glory" is a fun endless obstacle runner. 

The more wrestlers you have, the more points you get.

The more points you have and the more wrestlers you have, the faster you move.

Try to score as many points as possible, you may be in for a surprise. 

Write your maximum result in the comments!

Music used:

Menu: Ariel Beats - Turbo Rush 

Gameplay:

  • Inova - Lift Me Up
  • SVRGE - CONFINED
  • Epiphanism - Spectrum
  • Shane Ivers - Al Andalus
  • Rekrut Kurbel - EAST GERMANY HARDBASS
